short_summary:
Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest\Lower Bid
Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No
Nature of Requirements:

RFSO Grey\Black Water Flush RCN Ships

W3554-226336/A
Wadden,Dale
Telephone No. - (782) 641-647610.6  Fax No. - (902) 496-5016 ( )

This Request for Standing Offer is for the provision of services, labour, tools and equipment, and materials  necessary to perform Blackwater System Flushes onboard HMC Ships.  All work is to be performed in accordance with the specifications assigned to each specific call-up as directed by the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott in Halifax, Nova Scotia Contracts Office.  

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any in within the document
